website_summaries.verdict: Medical quality kit that makes an unpleasant task a touch more enjoyable.
pros: Most users say this kit makes an enema virtually pain-free
Open top stainless steel bucket allows for easy cleaning
Adjustable clamps allow you to control the flow of liquids
cons: Some say the insertion tips feel cheap

customer_reviews.title: Bucket rusts
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the company as I contacted them regarding my bucket that is rusting and they haven’t responded to my email. I purchased my system in august and it has rusted regardless of me following instructions for cleaning. It says 100% customer satisfaction guaranteed which is not true if you don’t respond to a customer issue. The product works excellent except for the rusting inside the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Clean your bodys trashcan
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the house has one, literally this is one bathroom, every bathroom in the house has these set up for health. If u brush your teeth , clean your ears, nose and take a shower to clean the outside.... would you not clean the body's trash can too???? Cleaning your insides. Nothing like it. I swear it changed all our lives. So wierd yet so amazing. Also has not rusted had themniver a year, my kid doesn not treat it as sanitary as she should. Anyone complaining about this is either too lazy to change the novel or not cleaning it. I have bought 4 of them in the past 2 years, just for everyone in the household.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Best Product for Detox and Coffee Enema!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness I’ve been using this product weekly for about 1 month now and my results are life changing in such a fast time frame! What an amazing product!!! Thank you!!! My head is clearer I have less pain, I’m more energized, my skin looks great, and I love my results with my Weightloss! And so does my husband 😏 I have already recommended it to friends and will continue to do so! Thank Aussie and Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Belombre

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Enema?  You Need This!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that is not only quality made, but is user friendly and comes with friendly support from the company that sells/manufactures it. I've been doing coffee enemas daily since I received this. Easy to use and clean up is a breeze. I highly recommend.d this product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Glennon

customer_reviews.title: CLAMP REALLY WORK
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product to others. This is my third kit and it surpass the previous two. So far I am thrilled with the NON LEAK CLAMP!!! That's correct the clamp really works. If you are purchasing an enema kit...this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: PURCO

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, the box appeared to have been rifled through - inappropriate and unhygienic.
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty disappointed in the fact that this product arrived missing assembly instructions and interior contents looking like it has already been opened and rifled through. It gives me concern for my safety and this product’s hygiene. Gross. These things theoretically should arrive packaged like its guarding Fort Knox. After all, it’s going to be going into deep space 9, wouldn’t you think some care and concern for consumers would suffice? (To be fair, not sure if amazon fulfillment did this or if it’s a manufacturer issue.) If you’re the manufacturer of this otherwise well-reviewed product, please feel free to contact me to discuss replacement in exchange for an adjustment of my review.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Dog

customer_reviews.title: Black Oily Residue would not come off
customer_reviews.text: The metal tin had a black oily residue. I scrubbed it with dawn multiple times, and boiled it. When it dried, i took a paper towel and rubbed the inside, and the black film was still there. I don't want to put that in my body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bucket is sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bucket is sturdy and easy to clean. The tubing and a tip has proper dia and material quality. The only thing is that stainless steel bucket has parts that are sharp to touch, I cut myself deeply first time when attaching tube and holding top part of the bucket. Top of the bucket where metal "folds" is sharp and i also cut myself. Every time i use it i have to remember to take time and be careful when assembling/ disassembling, which i rather think about other things i need to do in the busy mommy day schedule. 3.5 stars is more like it.
customer_reviews.author: Aqvila

customer_reviews.title: Decent accessories but Bucket RUSTS
customer_reviews.text: The product is generally decent. The tubing is good. The nozzles are good. I wish they would have included instructions, but enemas aren't that hard to figure out, so wasn't a big deal. HOWEVER, I have had the product for less than a week, have used it maybe 3-4 times, and the bucket is already rusting on the inside. Like many reviewers here, I also don't want to put rust debris in my body (have enough problems as it is). I wish the buckets were vetted a little better because in my case, have a tendency to rust. Side note: I have just been cleaning them with soft soap and water and then drying them after I wash them out.
customer_reviews.author: W.M. McBride

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Don't buy! I've only used this bucket 3 times since I bought it and it has rust and can't even be used anymore. Cheap.
customer_reviews.author: PachaMama

customer_reviews.title: Non toxic???? Actually Really toxic
customer_reviews.text: I have to return the package ... I love everything but unfortunately the bucket has rusted parts and I think that is dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: A box that said enema was dropped off at my door.
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning out your b-hole. HOWEVER, and this is a big however it showed up in its own box. So, there was a box in front of my apartment door that said ENEMA in big letters on the side. Now I’m a bald man ex addict and my ability to be humiliated died many years ago. BUT, some people may not feel the same as I.
customer_reviews.author: Delithril

customer_reviews.title: This thing is butt cleansing perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I am very serious about my enemas. This is my 4th system and already my favorite. I do regular coffee enemas for my health and issues with candida. I've been doing enemas since 2015, trust me...you'll love this one! The only thing I don't like..is it doesn't come with a hook, but thankfully I saved my old ones to hang it up.
customer_reviews.author: Chezby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super fast. Easy to use. Only issue was there were no directions--checked email, checked spam, and wasn't in the box either. But I was able to look it up on the website. Seems like a great quality product. Very happy! Update: Had this for a couple months now, and it's holding up great. Easy to use and clean. Very well made product for a good price, can't ask for more :) Grateful I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior. Will never go back
customer_reviews.text: Superior. Will never go back. This is the third different type of bucket i've purchased from various health stores. I'm extremely happy with this one in terms of quality and design. The tube is of a thick but soft sort of rubberized plastic feel. There are 5 attachments. The bucket itself feels solid. The clip on the hose performs various functions as far as locking AND allowing me to clip the hose onto the bucket so the hose isn't left dangling on the floor. I rarely post reviews but great job guys! Makes what I'm using it for, all the more easier.
customer_reviews.author: George Manko

customer_reviews.title: RUST
customer_reviews.text: Starting showing rust on inside after using and smells like funky metal. Also noticed some metal colored residue coming off of it while cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Wood

customer_reviews.title: Surface rust is concerning...
customer_reviews.text: First time enema kit buyer here. For my first kit this was a very nice crafted product. The bucket had some surface rust after a pure salt mixture that was used and was a bit concerning which is why I give it 3 stars. It is a hassle to keep it clean. After following the kits cleaning instructions, I coat my bucket lightly with some coconut oil to prevent the rust from happening and seems to work fairly well in keeping the rust at bay. Coconut oil is the best thing for almost anything I have found recently.
customer_reviews.author: Lunabell

customer_reviews.title: It changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be life-changing. Without getting too much information LOL I just like to say that I have always had a problem going to the bathroom. have gone two weeks without a bowel movement. I have had several test and they cannot find anything wrong with me other than they’re telling me my bowels don’t hold or absorb water blah...Blah....Blah.... take these pills 🧐. The Aussie health company has helped me so much! I have so much energy and I use it on a regular basis. I am very pleased 😚
customer_reviews.author: Tonya  Bz A

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed. This bucket is anything but user friendly. The bucket won't empty, the tubing is too thick for the clamp which makes it hard to stop the flow when it does trickle down. I've been doing coffee enemas for close to three years with no issues, i was using a bpa free plastic bucket but switched to stainless steel because its supposed to be less toxic. Im looking for another bpa free bucket right now. This was a total waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: shante708

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described by the company. Stainless "bucket" and appropriate tubing and insertion devices. The back flow preventor works very well and is important for preventing ascending bacterial contamination. Instruction manual is very basic and could probably offer more specifics on fluid amounts and mixtures and duration, but Im sure they dont want the legal quagmire of making medical advisements. I wish there was a way to see remaining fluid levels in the stainless container but that is not unique to this company. Overall the process is easy with plenty of on line tutorials to guide you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I have used it about 15 times in the past 3 weeks as part of my detoxification program, and it has worked very well and is easy to clean. I followed the cleaning instructions and haven't used any "cleaning products" on it so I think I avoided rust issues that others reported before me. I love the sturdiness, the bucket handle makes it easy to hang up, the hose is very nice, and the tips work well - all quality and makes me feel good about what I'm doing and that it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: Side clamp is unreliable; users beware
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars except for this very critical flaw: THE CLAMP IS NOT RELIABLE. It has popped open several times and caused a big clean up. The tube is a very big gauge, so I wonder why the side clamp provided is not appropriate. I also wonder if I can buy a side clamp that would properly accommodate the tubing.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva Ayte

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one
customer_reviews.text: Great product do your research coffee enemas are very good for you, my wife expelled corn she ate alost 2 1\2 wks ago and lost 5 pounds first time using.....we both had a rush of energy and clearer vision take activated charcoal so toxins from bile doesnt recirculate and remineralize yourself again do your research. the stainless steel is nice we are very happy
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good product! The only thing I don't like is the clamp doesnt work like it should!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! The only thing I don't like is the clamp doesnt work like it should! I also took someone elses advice and cut off abut 18 inches of the hose it was just to long to flow properly.
customer_reviews.author: PK1448

customer_reviews.title: Great products for those who want to take control of their health
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Aussie products for about 3 years now and I love them. Great ease of use, strong material, easy to clean. I use them for my coffee enema's on a daily basis. I even travel with them. You can't go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Alfred

customer_reviews.title: while considerably cheaper was not as easy to clean and let off a toxic odor
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to do rounds of enemas at home, invest in one of these. Initially, I had bought a bag enema that, while considerably cheaper was not as easy to clean and let off a toxic odor. I had to throw it away. You only want the purist things flowing into your colon and the stainless steel bucket and hose can be kept pristinely clean. I had to trim the hose to keep bubble from forming. Good set!
customer_reviews.author: rjx

customer_reviews.title: I don't believe the hose and attachments are BPA and phtalate free
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because the seller ensured me that the silicone hose and attachments were BPA and phtalate free. Upon opening the bag housing these items, there was a very strong, toxic, plastic odor. The hose felt like plastic, too. Silicone is supposed to not have much of a smell, if at all. I do not trust that this product is safe and will be returning it. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sokolod

customer_reviews.title: Needs better shut of system and better tip selection
customer_reviews.text: The reason for three stars is two major things. The first one is it can have a better shut off system like a valve also the valve can regulate the speed of the flow. Second, the tips are not that great, had to buy the thinner smaller tubes tips that work better for coffee enemas. If these two things can be upgraded this kit would be solid for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Zar

customer_reviews.title: very good product. Highly recommend for pancha karma detox
customer_reviews.text: great for ayurvedic cleanse. U can buy the aloe vera and coffee supplements and ayurvedic herbs to do a proper cleanse with coconut oil and it really helps if you have ibs or gastroparthesis.
customer_reviews.author: Educated Consumer NY FL

customer_reviews.title: This has a terrible perfume smell
customer_reviews.text: I have MCS and this reeks of perfume I would never purchase this again it's the silicon tubing it reeks. I don't want toxic stuff in me. I'm trying to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy brown

customer_reviews.title: Product is well made, but very difficult for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made, but very difficult for the contents to fully empty out - which is one of the main components. This makes it very difficult to use and a much more cumbersome process than my old bag that always emptied out. Also, since it's not clear, you can't see how much is still left in the bucket, which in hindsight is important.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This bucket system has everything you need. Meets all the standards for BPA free ect. Honestly the only thing I could of wanted that it didn't have was a hook in case I wanted to hang the bucket. The hose is long and enables you to roll from side to side if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely disappointing
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said,‘it’s almost impossible to get good flow from this. I followed instructions to flush the line and it still wouldn’t flow. The clamp also is not tight and sent coffee flying everywhere. I’m disappointed in who’s whole set up and feel like I wasted my money. The company doesn’t appear to monitor reviews nor answer questions on their website.
customer_reviews.author: honoryourspirit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect enema kit!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit. I did it first time today, never tried before and it was great. I would appreciate if the company gives link to youtube video in the documentation. The manual is not a good quality. I had to search web to find out instructions! That is why 4 stars. Otherwise it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: NirJ

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this: (( it gets air bubbles in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this :(( it gets air bubbles in the hose (I really love the nozzle though! It's soft and easy to insert) and the part that connects to the bucket comes loose and leaks :(
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the red water bottle/enema bag combos before this and I really wasn’t going to do enemas anymore because it was so hard to use and the tip was a hard plastic. Then this was recommend by a practitioner I trust and it’s been a game changer. Much, much easier and more comfortable to use (if an enema can be comfortable!). The company is also very, very responsive. I had trouble figuring out how to remove the tubing and then I had one connector break and they walked me through it all and got me the new connector within two days. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tatia

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STARS
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. The five star reviews are FAKE. Leaked on first use, liquid doesn’t flow, clamp is too difficult to use. Don’t waste your money, this was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylen5124

customer_reviews.title: Product well made and so far with good care no rust noted
customer_reviews.text: Product well made and so far with good care no rust noted. Think it is all in how things are maintained. Easy and convenient. Email states pdf to unlad re info but none included that I can find so use self knowledge. Glad to be able to access quality products.
customer_reviews.author: MDE

customer_reviews.title: A definite learning curve for me, I was unsure ...
customer_reviews.text: A definite learning curve for me, I was unsure when I ordered this kit if I would use it. It took a couple times to get used to it, but I now use it EVERY DAY.
customer_reviews.author: Aren J Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is my second kit. I was very pleased with the first one, so I purchased another one for our vacation home. Customer service is also good. A few years ago, when I had a minor issue with my bucket, they quickly shipped a replacement. Great kit for beginners. I gave the packaging one star, because it arrived in the original box and could have easily been damaged.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely happy with the results of doing coffee enemas and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before deciding to begin the enema process. I am extremely happy with the results of doing coffee enemas and the Aussie enema kit! This is easy to clean and use. I felt a difference after the first use of coffee enema. Increased energy levels, clearer thinking, over all pain decrease and a new sense of joy in my life again. I have been talking about this with my clients. Clean the crap out of our life to free up the space within our being to allow the natural flow. (All puns intended)
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fulcher

customer_reviews.title: Should send more discretely.
customer_reviews.text: OMG I just got this in the mail today and I cannot believe that they mail this without it being in another box. It had that tape on 2 of the sides, that says "do not use if seal is broken". I cut the seal that you see in the picture. I wonder if my mail carrier Googled what an enema bucket is! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Sage Green

customer_reviews.title: It's not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy to use. I've had other enema kits and this one is not my choice at all. The hole where the liquid comes out of the bucket is to high. Didn't like it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Salyer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered from this company
customer_reviews.text: Glad I ordered from this company. The product is as described and an excellent value. I had previously ordered from another company, of course at a lesser price, and was disappointed and returned their item. This is the kit I was searching for all along.
customer_reviews.author: bluen0te

customer_reviews.title: Get This One! I'm Impressed! High Quality and Top Notch Customer Support...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was very quick and the product exceptional. I'm impressed with customer service who emailed me to make sure I received my order and later on checked up on me via email to see if I was still happy with this purchase. I am more than happy with it. Very easy to setup and clean. Quality product through and through. So if you're looking for an enema kit then look no further! You will be pleased with this one. It's truly made from high quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Durable and quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this kit. I plan to do a regular enema and I know this will last very long time. It is also easy to clean. Easy to use. It is heavy so it sits properly or you can easily hang it on a hook because of the big handle.
customer_reviews.author: MK N.

customer_reviews.title: First use and the rubber seal came off and haven't been able to remount
customer_reviews.text: Was really happy with this product when it arrived. Quality materials. Good instructions. However, after the first use, while trying to clean the unit, the rubber seal inside dislodged and I haven't been able to get it back on. Without it, the unit will leak.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Slow product delivery and could clog easily.
customer_reviews.text: I bought from this company the same kit apps. 2 years ago. I just bought this new kit and do not like the setup. I use a great mesh screen to filter out the coffee grinds however the flow is slow and does seem to deliver the same way the original product did.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg S.

customer_reviews.title: Sanitary, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for semi-regular enemas I do to prevent obstructions following bowel resection surgery. Easy to clean, includes a soft nozzle that is more comfortable for insertion. I still use a standard lubricating jelly to help insert the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schiller

customer_reviews.title: Very nice the only con is no matter how I position ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this kit after using the old fashioned hot water bottle type for years. Very nice the only con is no matter how I position the bucket, I'm always left with liquid in both the bucket and the tubing. Otherwise, satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya C. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Did not come discreet! Haha
customer_reviews.text: No discreet packaging. Haha how awkward with my postal interaction. Thanks a ton. Works great by the way. I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Well built product. Stainless bucket is sturdy with a well attached bucket. Good quality hose and tips. The only thing I would add to the kit would be an S hook so that someone has the option of hanging it from a towel bar or something similar, but otherwise it is a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: I bought it because good reviews. The coffee flow control clip broke after ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because good reviews. The coffee flow control clip broke after two uses. So disappointed. Feel wasted. update. I ordered bulb to replace the bucket. After I contacted Aussie Health, Aussie Health refund me purchase price. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Chong S. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: BOLT LEAKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!!! The bolt that screws the spigot into the bucket leaks! Within a minute all the liquid was out on the floor. BUYER BEWARE, THIS WILL NOT LAST! It might be weeks, it might be a couple months but it's not built to last!!!! Sadly, I have referred many to this kit. Not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerCym17

customer_reviews.title: Great but after a few months and the tubing is moldy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this and it has helped me a lot. I'm just a little disappointed that after just a few months that the tubing is moldy. I do everything I can to make sure it hangs from a high place to get proper drainage. What could I have done to keep this from happening and is there a replacement tubing?
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, easy to clean much easier than a bag. My only compliant is it does not empty all the way unless it's angled. I am sure I will figure something out to resolve that issue... Other than that it's great compared to using a silicone bag. Very Fast clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Iacona

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well built. I was really excited about this product. After reading the instructions I prepped the unit and noticed I had dripping at the top of the enema can. The plastic /rubber like gauge the prevents liquid from seeping from the inside of the can was not secured. I though I had secured it. after cleaning, the rubber thing came off and went down the drain...So I'm stuck. I'm asking for another rubber gauge. I'll update from there.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very well made unit with high quality tubing. Much ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made unit with high quality tubing. Much easier to clean than the rubber bag type that I had previously.
customer_reviews.author: gbenson

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get the hose off
customer_reviews.text: So, I love this thing except for the hose is not easily removable like it says. And the backflow stopper won’t come off the other end of he hose, making it very hard to dry.
customer_reviews.author: wereferret

customer_reviews.title: I like that I can clean and sterilize this product for ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can clean and sterilize this product for safety and cleanliness! Does what it's meant to do. Can't ask for more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Spendin' Mama

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: All of the components in this kit are of the highest quality: The stainless steel bucket is so easy to clean, and the clear tubing allows you to check for any water droplets that have not completely dried yet (it is important that the inside of the tubing is completely dry before storing!). I highly recommend this kit to anyone interested in keeping themselves healthy through detoxification!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: No matter how hard I tried, I couldn't make the water flow. It was just stuck in the tube and it didn't flow. I changed the bucket position, I changed the hose position, I changed my body position million times - but nothing worked. I am frustrated and dissapointed I wasted money on this useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Meiramgul B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Tubing way too long. Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I find this very messy and hard to use. I have another one that is so much easier. When I clamp this is still leaks and the tip sprays all over the place. The tubing is way too long. I’ll re order from the company I got my last one from (Gerson).
customer_reviews.author: Traci J

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It’s just ok. The attachments are hard to get off. No matter what I do it collects air in the lower part. I don’t really like the actual part that goes in your body. I find it to be more irritating than helpful. Just not my favorite one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a stainless steel product because it is easy to clean and sterilize . I ordered a stainless steel strainer as well. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Slowbill

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set. I was hesitant because of the price, but if you plan on using often, it is well worth it for ease of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Clearly not a new, fresh out of the factory, set
customer_reviews.text: I am sad to say that this was not a new set. Finger prints all over the bucket, I can tell someone wiped it down and there are scratches at the bottom. Maybe not a big deal but doesn't feel sanitary for something that should be very sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality home equipment
customer_reviews.text: Stainless pot is easy to clean. Silicone tips far more comfortable than the hard plastic ones. High quality equipment for home use. It would be nice to have a clear gauge on the side
customer_reviews.author: Darcy J. Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived early and I love the quality and care that went into the product, packaging, instructions, and just...everything! I will be using Aussie Health Co for a long time because I believe they are a superior company with extra ordinary customer care.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Coffee/Water doesn't always flow easily out of tubing
customer_reviews.text: Like that it is made from stainless steel and easy to assemble. However, coffee/water doesn't always flow easily out of tubing. It keeps forming air bubbles and I haven't been able to get it to work properly after the first couple weeks of use. Would like to return but unfortunately I waited too long to do so.
customer_reviews.author: shopper23

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: My husband is doing coffee enemas (Gerson method) 2x weekly. He had been using another brand and recently bought this one. It is a lot easier to use, and the clear tube is a huge plus. Doesn't flow too fast or too slow, easy to open and close flow. We are happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, clear cut instruction, it is real stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart after using
customer_reviews.text: I only used it it 8 times and it started leaking. The rubber piece inside that’s connected to the spout, to prevent leaking, I found was distorted and impossible to fix. Was so frustrated I just threw it out. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Halle

customer_reviews.title: Fraud Not an Australian Company and Product is from CHINA
customer_reviews.text: This is not an Australian company, Its an American company using Australian business Name and other Australian Coffee enema companies product wording. In addition, the item IS NOT AUSTRALIAN MADE AS STATED, Its made in CHINA. I wanted to buy Australian ONLY because of many reasons, and also not pay the expensive shipping from the USA. FRAUD! this item is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chayne Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel will not stain from coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Perfect for Coffee Enemas, Highest Quality and Workmanship! 100% Satisfied! Will not be disappointed! Highest Recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great company! Great product and attachments
customer_reviews.text: Great company! Great product and attachments! I prefer the stainless steel bucket over the plastic because I don't want the hot water to leach plastic into my colon. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BUDDHA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent quality and construction. Holds up well for frequent/daily use. Very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: EChaves

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Product is good quality a nice accessory would be an S hook to hold bucket on top of door or towel rack so bucket is elevated Good communication. Fast shipment. Product worked as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for coffee enemas
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice kit. This was my first time doing an enema so I was quite awkward with it but worked great. Now that I have the hang of it things will go,smoother the next time. The kit is great and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: gerald karschner

customer_reviews.title: A modern twist to the old fashion water bag
customer_reviews.text: Very creative useful, can steep tea bags in the container, if desired, and use. A great find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: my last detox aid was a common (red) enema bag; I have no idea why but one day it just opened a gaping hole and lost all the liquid contents in a huge gush. I had never even hear of using a bucket. I am really glad to have found the aussie health stainless steel set up. it is sanitary, hold the temperature of the contents well and has the best ever hose. this is the detox unit to buy; no comparison
customer_reviews.author: lrcraig

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome enema cleansing set
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome enema cleansing set. However after about a month or so of use, the inside the pot is rusted. This needs to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this product. This is high quality and gorgeous. So beautiful that it's a shame to use it for its purpose. Quality! Quality! Quality!
customer_reviews.author: JUDY J.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for coffee enemas. I didn't want plastic or rubber due to the toxicity of those materials. I am very happy with this product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TheConsciousRN

customer_reviews.title: For Thinking People  ! A Must have product of top quality  !
customer_reviews.text: Great value ! Well made and desined . Good quality materials . I like the silicone hose and the insertion tips are very good and soft .

customer_reviews.text: I did my first enema and the Aussie Enema Kit worked great! I highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: I love it easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Product came in just one week..I love it easy to assemble. Was a little confused about what part to use for the insert because the box did not come with an instructions book or manual but it's not Rocket science lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lubricate steel nipple
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Be sure to lubricate steel nipple before inserting tube or else it will be hard to remove for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Aussie Health Co Non-Toxic Stainless steel enema bucket kit
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is the best product that I’ve ever purchased from amazon. This stainless steel bucket system is amazing! It works perfectly, and easy to clean. Don’t hesitate, just due yourself a favor and purchase this product. I promise you that it will change your life. Thank you Aussie Health for making this awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: angry birds hd

customer_reviews.title: KINKS IN HOSE
customer_reviews.text: The hose kinks and the kinks don’t go away, (I’m very ‘soft handed’ while using this equipment-hose kinks shouldn’t happen). The pail works just fine. Easy to keep clean. I needs go get a new hose though. 🤔 Hmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Thus far my husband hasn’t had any issues with the product & really enjoys it. It’s easy to clean & maintain at this point & is a pretty good product. I’m glad we were recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: Chawes

customer_reviews.title: Great product difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is great ! The down side is that it’s difficult to stabilize the bucket and to get the flow to go deep enough into the colon. I am disappointed with it for that reason. I spill it every time and can not get all of the coffee enema liquid out of the bucket. I am going to consider purchasing a silicon bag system.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Great construction
customer_reviews.text: This product is made well and all of the components are very sturdy. I'm completely satisfied and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: HMI Products

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what I was looking for. It is made well and easy to clean. I would recommend this if you are looking for a great product and easy to use and care for.
customer_reviews.author: William W Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good option.
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel bucket is the way to go. Easy to clean, sanitize, and durable for many uses and storage. All conections go on and come off fairly easily. Comes with bag for storage of bucket and all components, which is nice. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Customer superior

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use than enema bags! Non toxic. Excellent product! Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Only issue is that the drain isn’t directly at the bottom so when the coffee gets past the hose line but it’s not completely empty there does create some bubbles.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Simple, and works exactly as advertised. Good instructions and suggestions.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works great! So much better than using a hot water bottle bag and much cleaner.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit, keep in mind seems small but does hold plenty of water for an enema.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

product_meta.title: Aussie Health Co Enema Kit - Non-Toxic Stainless Steel 2 Quart Bucket - Ideal for Home Coffee or Water Colon Cleansing Detox Enemas - Includes Nozzle Tips, Guide Book, and Discrete Storage Bag
feature_bullets: ✅  FDA LISTED ENEMA BUCKET KIT | designed for Australian and American health standards with premium-purity(tm) #304 grade stainless steel and other materials. This colon cleansing enema bucket is made with medical grade, reusable, odorless, BPA and phthalates free stainless steel, silicone and PVC tips.

✅  VERSATILE LONG 6.5FT SILICONE TUBING | and strong durable clamp. This enema cleansing and detox equipment is ideal for home use and can be used for water and/or coffee enemas in or out of the shower. Open top stainless steel enema bucket allows for easy cleaning.

✅  MONEY BACK GUARANTEE | 100% satisfaction money back guarantee if you are not satisfied with your reusable enema bucket kit. We take great pride in the quality of our products and happy to offer this guarantee because of it.

✅  DISCREET DRAWSTRING STORAGE BAG | for storing your colonic irrigation kit. Whether at home or travelling, avoid any unnecessary conversations about doing an enema or douche, while keeping your kit clean and rust-free when not in use.

✅  5 ADDITIONAL TIPS | along with the 2 quart bucket kit (for coffee and water enemas), you will receive a colonic irrigation nozzle and a short nozzle tip as well as 3 soft, flexible, slimline tips for pain-free insertion. This is to maxmise comfort and cater for all preferences.
